column2:
"I'm so sorry...
I should apologize for having you
help me."

"I was so afraid you'd punish
me, I couldn't say it...
Forgive me."

"C-could you help me again?
Th...thank you so much!"

"This report is on Rockbear.
It sounds like a huge, dangerous native species though..."

"...I'll wait here until you return.
I'm counting on you."
